44.ara-name: كتاب الأمثال عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Hurairah:that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "The Parable of myself and that of my Ummah is that of a man who kindled a fire, and the flies and moths began flying into it - and I am trying to prevent you from diving into it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي مَثَلِ ابْنِ آدَمَ وَأَجَلِهِ وَأَمَلِهِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Parable Of The Son Of Adam, His Lifespan And His Hope
